FuncDef:
The max-load-balance command sets the maximum number of links for BIER tunnel load balancing.
The undo max-load-balance command restores the default configuration.
By default, the maximum number of links for BIER tunnel load balancing is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of links for BIER tunnel load balancing.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set the maximum number of links for BIER tunnel load balancing, run the max-load-balance command.
Prerequisites
A BIER subdomain has been configured using the sub-domain command.
